roleset.name: set, establish, decide, expressed with detail, pinpointed
roleset.note: SPECIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'specify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to 'determine' Member of VN classcharacterize-29.2. (from specify.01-v)
SPECIFIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, connection to'specify', 'specification'. (from specific.01-j)

example.name: specify a WH-phrase
example.text: [Mr. Edelman]-1 declined *trace*-1 to specify what promptedthe recent moves

example.name: specify an NP
example.text: First Interstate said its operations outside of Arizona ``achieved results as expected for the quarter,'' but didn'tspecify the results.

example.name: prd for specified as
example.text: The essence Pindyck's model is his specification of unit production cost as a decreasing function of concurrently availablereserves.
example.arg: as a decreasing function of concurrently available resources

example.name: arg0
example.text: *PRO* To be specific : more guns make possible more gun errors and misuse , more domestic and accidental injuries -LRB- deaths-RRB- in the home , and more reliance on lethal force to solveproblems that could be solved other ways .
example.arg: more guns make possible more gun errors and misuse , more domestic and accidental injuries -LRB- deaths -RRB- in thehome , and more reliance on lethal force to solve problems thatcould be solved other ways

example.name: both args
example.text: Or perhaps [your advisor]-1 said you needed an editor, but[*-1]wasn't very specific about why, and you need an objectiveperson to tell you the truth.

roleset.name: particular to, unique to
roleset.note: SPECIFIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from specific.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Perhaps your anxiety is specific to magicians
